attributes.action: Stop the government from abolishing the right to trial by jury
attributes.additional_details: The government must retain the human right of trial by jury as it is today.
attributes.background:
In a democratic society, the right to a fair trial is a fundamental human right. This right is under threat as our government considers abolishing it.

Without it, we give unfair advantage to the state over individuals, creating the potential for miscarriages of justice to occur.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Do not remove trial by jury for certain cases
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/751480
